errors.USER_ENROLLMENT_COUNT_TOO_LOW: You must want to enroll at least one student.
errors.USER_ENROLLMENT_COUNT_TOO_HIGH: You can enroll as many as __maxStudentCount__ students, no more.

hints.account: Users in Canvas must be registered within a specific account. If you happen to have more than one account, please specify the correct one.
hints.course: This would be the course we'll be enrolling the students in.

tooltips.id_prefix: Set a prefix that will be used for all the names and emails of the enrolled students. (Quizard will automatically generate one for you if you leave this blank.)
tooltips.id_range: The number that Quizard should start from for generating IDs for students.

ns_load_students.status_no_more_students: Nothing to do, no more students to load.
